EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Jacksonville Community Lunch & Golf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco in Jacksonville for a luncheon at the club house followed by an afternoon on the greens at TPC Sawgrass. At Turbonomic, our users are the core of our organization. They drive the evolution of our technology, shape our company culture, and even inspired out name change from VMTurbo to Turbonomic last August. Join us and Cisco in the new year to learn about what it means to be a Turbonomic customer. Jacksonville Community Lunch & Golf
Where: TPC Sawgrass 110 Championship Way, Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida 32082 Tuesday, January 18th 11:30am
Save the date for January 18th at 11:30AM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
